data.title: Federica Mogherini - Age, Family, Bio
data.meta_description: Federica Mogherini: her birthday, what she did before fame, her family life, fun trivia facts, popularity rankings, and more.
data.text:
About

Italian politician who is known for having served as Vice-President of the European Commission as well as President of the Foreign Affairs Council High Representative for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy. She is a member of the Democratic Party of Italy and has also served as Italy's Minister for Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation.

Before Fame

She studied Political Science at the Sapienza University of Rome where she wrote her final dissertation on Islam and politics. She started as a member of the Italian Communist Youth Federation in 1988. She became a member of the National Council of the Democrats of the Left in 2001. She became a member of the Chamber of Deputies in May of 2008 and later gained attention as the Minister of Foreign Affairs in 2014.

Trivia

She has been given an honorary doctorate degree from the University of Tampere in 2018 and was awarded the Hessian Peace Prize in 2017.

Family Life

She was born and raised in Rome, Italy. Her father was film director and set designer Flavio Mogherini. She married Matteo Rebesani in 2007 and together they have two children.
